data.feedback: The plan comprehensively covers ALL 9 user requirements with well-structured epics. File paths are verified - existing files correctly identified for modification, new files properly listed for creation. Backend API contracts are properly referenced to ensure frontend-backend alignment. Feature-based architecture pattern is consistently applied.
issues: Minor: Duplicate dependency in epic-ui-foundation dependencies array
Minor: Firebase config files should be user-provided, not created by developer
suggestions: Update story-platform-4 to note that Firebase config files must be provided by user after Firebase project setup
